name: Karen's Anti-R-age: A Battle Against Time!
name_original: Karen's Anti-R-age: A Battle Against Time!
description:
A little platformer where you start as a lovely old lady, but your time is running out…

You have to get some anti age cream to win your battle against time, and get to the end of the level, but be careful! too much cream will kill you.

Controls

Arrow keys: Move
Space or A button: Jump

Our Team

“The Idea Girl” and Moral Support
Yesica Alegre

Programming and Art
Martin Asteasuain
